messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Road Trip
messages.msgSnippet: Will you have time to travel outside of the immediate area of Salt Lake City?  Like an hour or so?  Or just in the city? ... [Non-text portions of this message
messages.messageBody:
Will you have time to travel outside of the immediate area of Salt Lake
City? Like an hour or so? Or just in the city?


At 08:02 AM 7/5/2003 -0700, you wrote:
>We're planning a brief road trip to Sun Valley, Aspen, and Salt Lake City
>to keep dh company.
>
>If anyone knows of any "must sees", please let me know! (both kids are
>under age 11)
>
>Mary Ellen
>

messages.subject: Road Trip
messages.msgSnippet: We re planning a brief road trip to Sun Valley, Aspen, and Salt Lake City to keep dh company. If anyone knows of any must sees , please let me know!   (both
messages.messageBody:
We're planning a brief road trip to Sun Valley, Aspen, and Salt Lake City to keep dh company.

If anyone knows of any "must sees", please let me know! (both kids are under age 11)

Mary Ellen

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
